<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Magma Scorpion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=658)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Whether skittering through Abyssal wastelands or basking in the searing sand of the deepest deserts, magma scorpions have charred carapaces constantly emitting vision-warping waves of heat.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalFire_MagmaScorpion.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Magma Scorpion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=658)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Smoke Vision** The magma scorpion ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 155

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pincer +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail sting +20 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+9 piercing plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and magma scorpion venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
magma spit +17 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+9 fire plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Magma Scorpion Venom**  ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Injury](/Traits.aspx?ID=97), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d6 fire damage (1 round) and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13); **Stage 2** 3d6 fire damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-43" />
name: Magma Scorpion
